text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
translation: (29) And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul,[675] then fall down to him in prostration."
footnotes: [675]- The element of life and soul which Allāh created for that body, not His own spirit or part of Himself (as some mistakenly believe).
